Question: Shenzhen Kingtop Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen KingTop Technology Co., Ltd

Product 1

- Founded in 2004, specializing in PCB & PCBA manufacturing
- Offers circuit design and app development services
- R&D teams and assembly lines for electronic product development
- 3500 square meters dust-free workshop with advanced hardware equipment
- Capable of producing various electronic products for export, including industrial embedded PC, computer mainboard, solar energy, AI, UAV, robotic, display, digital electronics, professional music device, POS, security, smart home, EV charger, GPS, IoT, and industrial automation temperature controller
- Can assemble 0201/01005 chip and QFP/BGA/QFN with a pitch of 0.2mm
- Provides one-stop service for PCB assembly and component sourcing
